metadata.source: Constantina R. Bailly (repr. Delhi 1990, Garib Dass Oriental Series, 109)

body.text: na dhyāyato na japataḥ syād yasyāvidhipūrvakam &

children.text: evam eva śivabhāsas taṃ numo bhaktiśālinam // UtSst_1.1 //
lokayātrārajorāgāt palitair iva dhūsaraḥ // UtSst_1.2 //
saṃcāro lokamārge 'pi syāt tayaiva vijṛmbhayā // UtSst_1.3 //
kiṃ na bhaktimatāṃ kṣetram mantraḥ kvaiṣām na siddhyati // UtSst_1.4 //
advitīyā api sadā tvaddvitīyā api prabho // UtSst_1.5 //

body.text: anantānandasindhos te nātha tattvaṃ vidanti te &

children.text: tādṛśa eva ye sāndrabhaktyānandarasāplutāḥ // UtSst_1.6 //

body.text: tvam evātmeśa sarvasya sarvaś cātmani rāgavān &

children.text: iti svabhāvasiddhāṃs tvadbhaktiṃ jānañ jayej janaḥ // UtSst_1.7 //

body.text: nātha vedyakṣaye kena na dṛśyo 'syekakaḥ sthitaḥ &

children.text: vedyavedakasaṃkṣobhe 'py asi bhaktaiḥ sudarśanaḥ // UtSst_1.8 //
aviyuktāsti te tadvad ekā tvadbhaktir astu me // UtSst_1.9 //
saṃvinmārgo 'yam āhlādaduḥkhamohais tridhā sthitaḥ // UtSst_1.10 //
daśā sā māṃ prati svāmin nāsavasyeva śuktatā // UtSst_1.11 //
vidyāvidyobhayasyāpi tā ete tattvavedinaḥ // UtSst_1.12 //
tvadbhaktisudhayā siktā tadrasāḍhyaphalāstu me // UtSst_1.13 //

body.text: śivo bhūtvā yajeteti bhakto bhūtveti kathyate &

children.text: tvam eva hi vapuḥ sāraṃ bhaktair advayaśodhitam // UtSst_1.14 //
tadasiddhyai nikṛṣṭānāṃ kāni nāvaraṇāni vā // UtSst_1.15 //
anyathā sarvakakṣyāsu bhāsi bhaktimatāṃ katham // UtSst_1.16 //
yogibhyo bhaktibhājām yad vyutthāne 'pi samāhitāḥ // UtSst_1.17 //

body.text: na yogo na tapo nārcākramaḥ ko 'pi pranīyate &

children.text: amāye śivamārge 'smin bhaktir ekā praśasyate // UtSst_1.18 //
pratyakṣasarvabhāvasya cintānām api naśyatu // UtSst_1.19 //

body.text: śiva ity ekaśabdasya jihvāgre tiṣṭhataḥ sadā &

children.text: samastaviṣayāsvādo bhakteṣv evāsti ko 'py aho // UtSst_1.20 //
alaukikarasāsvāde susthaiḥ ko 'nāma gaṇyate // UtSst_1.21 //
tādṛśī bhagavan yasyā mokṣākhyo 'nantaro rasaḥ // UtSst_1.22 //

body.text: tā eva paramarthyante sampadaḥ sadbhir īśa yāḥ &

children.text: tvad bhaktirasasambhogavisrambhaparipoṣikāḥ // UtSst_1.23 //
ye na rāgādi paṅke 'smiṃḷ lipyante patitā api // UtSst_1.24 //
bhavadbhakter vipakvāyā latāyā iva keṣu cit // UtSst_1.25 //

body.text: citraṃ nisargato nātha duḥkhabījam idaṃ manaḥ &

children.text: tvadbhaktirasasaṃsiktam niḥśreyasamahāphalam // UtSst_1.26 //
svarūpa bahurūpāya namaḥ saṃvinmayāya te // UtSst_2.1 //
mahānalāya bhavate viśvaikahaviṣe namaḥ // UtSst_2.2 //
kasmai cid viśvasaṃploṣaviṣamāya namo 'stu te // UtSst_2.3 //
maheśvarāyāpi namaḥ kasmai cin mantramūrtaye // UtSst_2.4 //
vasekaviṣamāyāpi maṅgalāya śivāgnaye // UtSst_2.5 //
tasmai namo 'stu devāya kasmai cid api śambhave // UtSst_2.6 //
vedāgamasatattvāya guhyāya svāmine namaḥ // UtSst_2.7 //
namaḥ samsārarūpāya niḥsaṃsārāya śambhave // UtSst_2.8 //
kṣīnāgramadhyamūlāya namaḥ pūrṇāya śambhave // UtSst_2.9 //
yasya nāmagrahas tasmai durlabhāya śivāya te // UtSst_2.10 //
krīḍate tubhyam ekasmai cinmayāya kapāline // UtSst_2.11 //
sūkṣmāya viśvarūpāya namaś citrāya śambhave // UtSst_2.12 //
āścaryakaraṇīyāya namas te sarvaśaktaye // UtSst_2.13 //

body.text: taṭeṣv eva paribhrāntaiḥ labdhās tās tā vibhūtayaḥ &

children.text: yasya tasmai namas tubhyam agādhaharasindhave // UtSst_2.14 //
alepāya namaḥ śambhuśatapatrāya śobhine // UtSst_2.15 //
priyāya paramārthāya sarvotkṛṣṭāya te namaḥ // UtSst_2.16 //
bandhamokṣavihīnāya kasmai ci d api śambhave // UtSst_2.17 //
tubhyam evādvitīyāya namo nityasukhāsine // UtSst_2.18 //
sarvācārāya śarvāya nirācārāya te namaḥ // UtSst_2.19 //

body.text: yathā tathāpi yaḥ pūjyo yatra tatrāpi yo 'rcitaḥ &

children.text: yo 'pi vā so 'pi vā yo 'sau devas tasmai namo 'stu te // UtSst_2.20 //
namo vitatalāvaṇyavarāya varadāya te // UtSst_2.21 //
trilokāya namas tubhyaṃ svāmine nityaparvaṇe // UtSst_2.22 //
tvām eva tasmai ghorāya śaktivṛndāya te namaḥ // UtSst_2.23 //
āliṅganty api yaṃ tasmai kasmai cid bhavate namaḥ // UtSst_2.24 //
sarvapāramyapāramyaprāpyāya bhavate namaḥ // UtSst_2.25 //
apūrvamodasubhagaṃ parāmṛtarasolvaṇam // UtSst_2.26 //
citraṃ nāsty eva yatreśa tan naumi tava śāsanam // UtSst_2.27 //
sarvāmaṅgalyakalpāntaṃ mārgaṃ māheśvaraṃ numaḥ // UtSst_2.28 //

body.text: jaya deva namo namo 'stu te sakalaṃ viśvam idaṃ tavāśritam &

children.text: jagatāṃ parameśvaro bhavān paramekaḥ śaraṇāgato 'smi te // UtSst_2.29 //

body.text: sadasattvena bhāvānāṃ yuktā yā dvitayī gatiḥ &

children.text: tām ullaṅghya tṛtīyasmai namaś citrāya śambhave // UtSst_3.1 //
svatantrās te svatantrasya ye tavaivānujīvinaḥ // UtSst_3.2 //
yeṣām bhavarujām ekaṃ bheṣajaṃ te sukhāsinaḥ // UtSst_3.3 //
cāmaraṃ svardhunīsrotaḥ sa ekaḥ parameśvaraḥ // UtSst_3.4 //

body.text: prakāśāṃ śītalām ekāṃ śuddhāṃ śaśikalām iva &

children.text: dṛśaṃ vitara me nātha kām apy amṛtavāhinīm // UtSst_3.5 //
imāḥ kathaṃ me bhagavan nāmṛtāsvādasundarāḥ // UtSst_3.6 //

body.text: tvayi rāgarase nātha na magnaṃ hṛdayaṃ prabho &

children.text: yeṣām ahṛdayā eva te 'vajñaspadam īdṛśāḥ // UtSst_3.7 //
prābhavīṇāṃ vibhūtīnāṃ paramekaḥ sa bhājanam // UtSst_3.8 //

body.text: harṣāṇām atha śokānāṃ sarveṣāṃ plāvakaḥ samam &

children.text: bhavaddhyānāmṛtāpūro nimnāṇimnabhuvām iva // UtSst_3.9 //

body.text: keva na syād dṛśā teṣāṃ sukhasambhāranirbharā &

children.text: yeṣām ātmādhikeneśa na kvāpi virahas tvayā // UtSst_3.10 //

body.text: garjāmi bata nṛtyāmi pūrṇā mama manorathāḥ &

children.text: svāmī mamaiṣa ghaṭito yat tvam atyantarocanaḥ // UtSst_3.11 //

body.text: nānyad vedyaṃ kriyā yatra nānyo yogo vidā ca yat &

children.text: jñānaṃ syāt kiṃ tu viśvaikapūrṇā cittvaṃ vijṛmbhate // UtSst_3.12 //
hastāt palāyitā yeṣāṃ vāci śaśvacchivadhvaniḥ // UtSst_3.13 //
tvaṃ mahāpuruṣas tv eko niḥśeṣapuruṣāśrayaḥ // UtSst_3.14 //

body.text: jayanti te jagadvandyā dāsās te jagatāṃ vibho &

children.text: saṃsārārṇava evaiṣa yeṣāṃ krīḍāmahāsaraḥ // UtSst_3.15 //
tvam eva prakaṭībhūyā ity anenaiva lajjyate // UtSst_3.16 //
tattvena japa ity akṣamālayā diśasi kvacit // UtSst_3.17 //

body.text: sato 'vaśyaṃ paramasat sac ca tasmāt paraṃ prabho &

children.text: tvaṃ cāsataḥ sataś cānyas tenāsi sadasanmayaḥ // UtSst_3.18 //
api tvaṃ sarvabhuvanavyāpako 'pi na dṛśyase // UtSst_3.19 //

body.text: jaḍe jagati cidrūpaḥ kila vedye 'pi vedakaḥ &

children.text: vibhur mite ca yenāsi tena sarvottamo bhavān // UtSst_3.20 //

body.text: alam ākranditair anyair iyad eva puraḥ prabhoḥ &

children.text: tīvraṃ viraumi yan nātha muhyāmy evaṃ vidann api // UtSst_3.21 //

body.text: capalam asi yad api mānasa tatrāpi ślāghyase yato bhajase &

children.text: śaraṇānām api śaraṇaṃ tribhuvanagurum ambikākāntam // UtSst_4.1 //
āśrityāpy adharatarāṃ bhūmiṃ nādyāpi citram ujjhāmi // UtSst_4.2 //
yāvad bhavāmi bhagavaṃs tava sapadi sadodito dāsaḥ // UtSst_4.3 //

body.text: śiva śiva śambho śaṅkara śaraṇāgatavatsalāśu kuru karuṇām &

children.text: tava caraṇakamalayugalasmaraṇaparasya hi sampado 'dūre // UtSst_4.4 //
te viriñcim adhikāramalenāliptam asvavaśam īśa hasanti // UtSst_4.5 //

body.text: tvatprakāśavapuṣo na vibhinnaṃ kiṃ cana prabhavati pratibhātum &

children.text: tat sadaiva bhagavan parilabdho 'sīśvara prakṛtito 'pi vidūraḥ // UtSst_4.6 //

body.text: pādapaṅkajarasaṃ tava ke cid bhedaparyuṣitavṛttim upetāḥ &

children.text: ke canāpi rasayanti tu sadhyo bhātam akṣatavapur dvayaśūnyam // UtSst_4.7 //

body.text: nātha vidyud iva bhāti vibhāte yā kadā cana mamāmṛtadigdhā &

children.text: sā yadi sthirataraiva bhavet tat pūjito 'si vidhivat kim utānyat // UtSst_4.8 //

body.text: sarvam asyaparam asti na kiṃ cid vastv avastu yadi veti mahatyā &

children.text: prajñāya vyavasito 'tra yathaiva tvaṃ tathaiva bhava suprakaṭo me // UtSst_4.9 //

body.text: svecchayaiva bhagavan nijamārge kāritaḥ padam ahaṃ prabhunaiva &

children.text: tat kathaṃ janavad eva carāmi tvatpadocitam avaimi na kiṃ cit // UtSst_4.10 //

body.text: ko 'pi deva hṛdi teṣu tāvako jṛmbhate subhagabhāva uttamaḥ &

children.text: tvatkathāmbudaninādacātakā yena te 'pi subhagīkṛtāś ciram // UtSst_4.11 //

body.text: tvajjuṣāṃ tvayi kayāpi līlayā rāga eṣa paripoṣam āgataḥ &

children.text: yad viyogabhuvi saṅkathā tathā saṃsmṛtiḥ phalati saṃgamotsavam // UtSst_4.12 //
śabda āviśati tiryagāśayeṣv apy ayaṃ navanavaprayojanaḥ // UtSst_4.13 //

body.text: te jayanti mukhamaṇḍale bhraman asti yeṣu niyataṃ śivadhvaniḥ &

children.text: yaḥ śāśīva prasṛto 'mṛtāśayāt svādu saṃsravati cāmṛtaṃ param // UtSst_4.14 //

body.text: parisamāptam ivogram idaṃ jagad vigalito 'viralo manaso malaḥ &

children.text: tad api nāsti bhavatpurārgalakavāṭavighaṭṭanam aṇva pi // UtSst_4.15 //
kim api tat kuru nātha manāg iva sphurasi yena mamābhimukhasthitiḥ // UtSst_4.16 //

body.text: tvadavibhedamater aparaṃ nu kiṃ sukham ihāsti vibhūtir athāparā &

children.text: tad iha tāvakadāsajanasya kiṃ kupatham eti manaḥ parihṛtya tām // UtSst_4.17 //

body.text: kṣaṇam apīha na tāvakadāsatāṃ prati bhaveyam ahaṃ kila bhājanam &

children.text: bhavadabhedarasāsavam ādarād avirataṃ rasayeyam ahaṃ na cet // UtSst_4.18 //

body.text: na kila paśyati satyam ayaṃ janas tava vapur dvayadṛṣṭimalīmasaḥ &

children.text: tad api sarvavidāśritavatsalaḥ kim idam āraṭitaṃ na śṛṇoṣi me // UtSst_4.19 //

body.text: smarasi nātha kadācid apīhitaṃ viṣayasaukhyam athāpi mayārthitam &

children.text: satatam eva bhavadvapurīkṣaṇāmṛtamabhīṣṭamalaṃ mama dehi tat // UtSst_4.20 //

body.text: kila yadaiva śivādhvani tāvake kṛtapado 'smi maheśa tavecchayā &

children.text: śubhaśatānyuditāni tadaiva me kim aparaṃ mṛgaye bhavataḥ prabho // UtSst_4.21 //

body.text: yatra so 'stam ayam eti vivasvāṃś candramaḥ prabhṛtibhiḥ saha sarvaiḥ &

children.text: kāpi sā vijayate śivarātriḥ svaprabhāprasarabhāsvararūpā // UtSst_4.22 //

body.text: apy upārjitam ahaṃ triṣu lokeṣv adhipatyam amareśvara manye &

children.text: nīrasaṃ tad akhilaṃ bhavadaṅghrisparśanāmṛtarasena vihīnam // UtSst_4.23 //

body.text: bata nātha dṛḍho 'yam ātmabandho bhavadakhyātimayas tvayaiva kḷptaḥ &

children.text: yad ayaṃ prathamānam eva me tvām avadhīrya ślathate na leśato 'pi // UtSst_4.24 //

body.text: mahatām amareśa pūjyamāno 'py aniśaṃ tiṣṭhasi pūjakaikarūpaḥ &

children.text: bahirantarapīha dṛśyamānaḥ sphurasi draṣṭṛśarīra eva śaśvat // UtSst_4.25 //
galepādikayā nātha māṃ svaveśma praveśaya // UtSst_5.1 //
apārarabhasārabdhanartanaḥ syām ahaṃ kadā // UtSst_5.2 //

body.text: tvad ekanātho bhagavann iyad evārthaye sadā &

children.text: tvadantarvasatir mūko bhaveyaṃ mānyathā budhaḥ // UtSst_5.3 //

body.text: aho sudhānidhe svāminn aho mṛṣṭa trilocana &

children.text: aho svādo virūpakṣety eva nṛtyeyam āraṭan // UtSst_5.4 //
vijṛmbheyabhavadbhaktimadirāmadaghūrṇitaḥ // UtSst_5.5 //

body.text: cittabhūbhṛd bhuvi vibho vaseyaṃ kvāpi yatra sā &

children.text: nirantaratvatpralāpamayī vṛttir mahārasā // UtSst_5.6 //

body.text: yatra devīsametas tvam āsaudhādā ca gopurāt &

children.text: bahurūpaḥ sthitas tasmin vāstavyaḥ syām ahaṃ pure // UtSst_5.7 //
vikasatveṣa yāvan me hṛtpadmaḥ pūjanāya te // UtSst_5.8 //

body.text: prasīda bhagavan yena tvatpade patitaṃ sadā &

children.text: mano me tattadāsvādya kṣīved iva galed iva // UtSst_5.9 //

body.text: praharṣād vātha śokād vā yadi kuṅyād dhaṭād api &

children.text: bāhyād athāntarād bhāvāt prakaṭībhava me prabho // UtSst_5.10 //

body.text: bahir apy antar api tat syandamānaṃ sadāstu me &

children.text: bhavatpādāmbujasparśāmṛtam atyantaśītalam // UtSst_5.11 //
ko 'py eṣa sarvasambhogalaṅghī bhogo 'stu me sadā // UtSst_5.12 //
ādāya cāmṛtīkṛtya bhuṅkṣva bhaktajanaiḥ samam // UtSst_5.13 //
svāmin gṛhāṇa dāseṣu prasādālokanakṣaṇam // UtSst_5.14 //
namo mahyaṃ śivāyeti pūjayam syāṃ tṛṇāny api // UtSst_5.15 //
paśyan bhaktirasābhogair bhaveyam aviyojitaḥ // UtSst_5.16 //

body.text: ākāmkṣaṇīyam aparaṃ yena nātha na vidyate &

children.text: tava tenādvitīyasya yuktaṃ yat paripūrṇatā // UtSst_5.17 //
pīyate bhaktipīyūṣarasas tat prāpnuyāṃ padam // UtSst_5.18 //
etu mama manasi yāvann aśyatu durvāsanāgandhaḥ // UtSst_5.19 //

body.text: kva nu rāgādiṣu rāgaḥ kva ca haracaraṇāmbujeṣu rāgitvam &

children.text: itthaṃ virodharasikaṃ bodhaya hitam amara me hṛdayam // UtSst_5.20 //
tvaccintāmadirāmadataralīkṛtahṛdaya eva syām // UtSst_5.21 //
sarvatra sarvadā me puraḥsaro bhavatu bhaktirasaḥ // UtSst_5.22 //

body.text: śivaśivaśiveti nāmani tava niravadhi nātha japyamāne 'smin &

children.text: āsvādayan bhaveyaṃ kam api mahārasam apunaruktam // UtSst_5.23 //
agaṇitāparacinmayagaṇḍike pravicareyam ahaṃ bhavato 'rcitā // UtSst_5.24 //

body.text: svavapuṣi sphuṭabhāsini śāśvate sthitikṛte na kim apy upayujyate &

children.text: iti matiḥ sudṛḍhā bhavatāt paraṃ mama bhavaccaraṇābjarajaḥ śuceḥ // UtSst_5.25 //

body.text: kim api nātha kadācana cetasi sphurati tad bhavadaṃghritalaspṛśām &

children.text: galati yatra samastamidaṃ sudhāsarasi viśvam idaṃ diśa me sadā // UtSst_5.26 //
nibiḍaṃ tapyamānasya sadā bhūyā dṛśaḥ padam // UtSst_6.1 //
aviyuktaḥ sadaiva syāṃ jagatāpi viyojitaḥ // UtSst_6.2 //

body.text: kāyavāṅmanasair yatra yāmi sarvaṃ tvam eva tat &

children.text: ity eṣa paramārtho 'pi paripūrṇo 'stu me sadā // UtSst_6.3 //
bhavatstutikarī bhūyād anurūpaiva vāṅ mama // UtSst_6.4 //
vicareyaṃ nirākāṅkṣaḥ praharṣaparipūritaḥ // UtSst_6.5 //
tāvataivāsmi santuṣṭas tato na parikhidyase // UtSst_6.6 //

body.text: vilīyamānās tvayy eva vyomni meghalavā iva &

children.text: bhāvā vibhāntu me śaśvat kramanairmalyagāminaḥ // UtSst_6.7 //
santataṃ bhātu me ko 'pi bhavamadhyād bhavanmaṇiḥ // UtSst_6.8 //

body.text: kāṃ bhūmikāṃ nādhiśeṣe kiṃ tat syād yan na te vapuḥ &

children.text: śrāntas tenāprayāsena sarvatas tvām avāpnuyām // UtSst_6.9 //
ghaṭatām iyati prāpte kiṃ nātha na jitaṃ mayā // UtSst_6.10 //
kurmas te nātha tāmyantas tvām eva mṛgayāmahe // UtSst_6.11 //

body.text: tvayy ānandasarasvati samarasatām etya nātha mama cetaḥ &

children.text: pariharatu sakṛd iyantaṃ bhedādhīnaṃ mahānartham // UtSst_7.1 //

body.text: etan mama na tv idam iti rāgadveṣādinigaḍadṛḍhamūle &

children.text: nātha bhavanmayataikyapratyayaparaśuḥ patatvantaḥ // UtSst_7.2 //
bhagavann ānandarasaplutāstu me cinmayī mūrtiḥ // UtSst_7.3 //
āpyāyayatu rasair māṃ pravṛddhapakṣo yathā bhavāmi khagaḥ // UtSst_7.4 //
cittam idaṃ niḥśeṣitaviṣayaviṣāsaṅgavāsanāvadhi me // UtSst_7.5 //
cetomaṇir vimūñcaturāgādikataptavahnikaṇān // UtSst_7.6 //

body.text: tasmin pade bhavantaṃ satatam upaślokayeyam atyuccaiḥ &

children.text: hariharyaśvaviriñcā api yatra bahiḥ pratīkṣante // UtSst_7.7 //
śivamayam akhilaṃ lokaṃ kriyāś ca pūjāmayī sakalāḥ // UtSst_7.8 //
sūtvā subaddhamūlā mameti buddhiṃ dṛḍhīkurutām // UtSst_7.9 //

body.text: yaḥ prasādalava īśvarasthito yā ca bhaktir iva mām upeyuṣī &

children.text: tau parasparasamanvitau kadā tādṛśe vapuṣi rūḍhim eṣyataḥ // UtSst_8.1 //
sarvakālam iha me param astu jñānayogamahimādi vidūre // UtSst_8.2 //

body.text: lokavadbhavatu me viṣayeṣu sphīta eva bhagavanparitarṣaḥ &

children.text: kevalaṃ tava śarīratayaitān+ lokayeyam aham astavikalpaḥ // UtSst_8.3 //

body.text: dehabhūmiṣu tathā manasi tvaṃ prāṇavartmani ca bhedam upete &

children.text: saṃvidaḥ pathiṣu teṣu ca tena svātmanā mama bhava sphuṭarūpaḥ // UtSst_8.4 //

body.text: nijanijeṣu padeṣu patantv imāḥ karaṇavṛttaya ullasitā mama &

children.text: kṣaṇamapīśa manāg api maiva bhūt tvadavibhedarasakṣatisāhasam // UtSst_8.5 //
vapur akhilapadārthapaddhater vyavahārān ativartayeya tān // UtSst_8.6 //

body.text: vikasatu svavapur bhavadātmakaṃ samupayāntu jaganti mamāṅgatām &

children.text: vrajatu sarvam idaṃ dvayavalgitaṃ smṛtipathopagame 'py anupākhyatām // UtSst_8.7 //
mama ghaṭeta yathā bhavadadvayāprathanaghoradarīparipūraṇam // UtSst_8.8 //
sakalalokasukheṣu parāṅmukho na bhavitāsmy ubhayacyuta eva kim // UtSst_8.9 //

body.text: satatam eva bhavaccaraṇāmbujākaracarasya hi haṃsavarasya me &

children.text: upari mūlatalād api cāntarād upanamatv aja bhaktimṛṇālikā // UtSst_8.10 //

body.text: upayāntu vibho samastavastūny api cintāviṣayaṃ dṛśaḥ padaṃ ca &

children.text: mama darśanacintanaprakāśāmṛtasārāṇi paraṃ parisphurantu // UtSst_8.11 //

body.text: parameśvara teṣu teṣu kṛcchreṣv api nāmopanamatsv ahaṃ bhaveyam &

children.text: na paraṃ gatabhīs tvadaṅgasaṅgādupajātādhikasammado 'pi yāvat // UtSst_8.12 //

body.text: bhavadātmani viśvam umbhitaṃ yad bhavataivāpi bahiḥ prakāśyate tat &

children.text: iti yad dṛḍhaniścayopajuṣṭaṃ tad idāniṃ sphuṭam eva bhāsatām // UtSst_8.13 //
pravarteta vihāyānyan mama tvatsparśane manaḥ // UtSst_9.1 //
kadā sākṣātkariṣyāmi bhavantam ayam utsukaḥ // UtSst_9.2 //
paṭapaṭiti vighaṭitākhilamahārgalas tvām upaiṣyāmi // UtSst_9.3 //
kadā nātha vaśīkuryāṃ bhavadbhaktiprabhāvataḥ // UtSst_9.4 //

body.text: kadā me syād vibho bhūri bhaktyānandarasotsavaḥ &

children.text: yadālokasukhānandī pṛthaṅ nāmāpi lapsyate // UtSst_9.5 //

body.text: īśvaram abhayam udāraṃ pūrṇam akāraṇam apahnutātmānaṃ &

children.text: sahasābhijñāya kadā svāmijanaṃ lajjayiṣyāmi // UtSst_9.6 //

body.text: kadā kām api tāṃ nātha tava vallabhatām iyām &

children.text: yayā māṃ prati na kvāpi yuktaṃ te syāt palāyitum // UtSst_9.7 //
dṛṣṭyānumoditarasāplāvitaḥ syāṃ kadā vibho // UtSst_9.8 //

body.text: jñānasya paramā bhūmir yogasya paramā daśā &

children.text: tvadbhaktir yā vibho karhi pūrṇa me syāt tadarthitā // UtSst_9.9 //
tvaccaraṇavaranidhānaṃ sarvasya prakaṭayiṣyāmi // UtSst_9.10 //
syāṃ yatheśa na kiñcin me māyācchāyābilaṃ bhavet // UtSst_9.11 //
kadā bhaveyaṃ bhagavaṃs tvadbhaktagaṇanāyakaḥ // UtSst_9.12 //
mahābhimānaḥ karhi syāṃ tvadbhaktirasapūritaḥ // UtSst_9.13 //
śayīyam iva śītāṅghrikuśeśayayuge kadā // UtSst_9.14 //
kadā pāraṃ gamiṣyāmi bhaviṣyāmi kadā kṛtī // UtSst_9.15 //
hāsollāsitavadanas tvatsparśarasaṃ kadāpsyāmi // UtSst_9.16 //

body.text: paśujanasamānavṛttām avadhūya daśām imāṃ kadā śambho &

children.text: āsvādayeya tāvakabhaktocitam ātmano rūpam // UtSst_9.17 //
tvadbhaktirasāyanapānakriḍhāniṣṭaḥ kadāsīya // UtSst_9.18 //

body.text: nātha kadā sa tathāvidha ākrando me samuccared vāci &

children.text: yat samanantaram eva sphurati puras tāvakī mūrtiḥ // UtSst_9.19 //
vastv avastv idam ayatnata eva tvāṃ kadā samavalokayitāsmi // UtSst_9.20 //

body.text: na soḍhavyam avaśyam te jagadekaprabhor idam &

children.text: māheśvarāś ca lokānām itareṣāṃ samāś ca yat // UtSst_10.1 //
yatra tatra gatā bhogāṃs te kāṃś cid upabhuñjate // UtSst_10.2 //

body.text: bhartā kālāntako yatra bhavāṃs tatra kuto rujaḥ &

children.text: tatra cetarabhogāśā kā lakṣmīr yatra tāvakī // UtSst_10.3 //
tadaiva sarvaḥ kālo 'sya tvadānandena pūryate // UtSst_10.4 //
sūryas tathā te prasṛtaḥ saṃhārī tejasaḥ kaṇaḥ // UtSst_10.5 //

body.text: baliṃ yāmas tṛtīyāya netrāyāsmai tava prabho &

children.text: alaukikasya kasyāpi māhātmyasyaikalakṣmaṇe // UtSst_10.6 //
kathañcid yasya vā harṣaḥ ko 'pi tena tvam īkṣitaḥ // UtSst_10.7 //

body.text: yeṣām prasanno 'si vibho yair labdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ tava &

children.text: ākṛṣya tvatpurāttais tu bāhyam ābhyantarīkṛtam // UtSst_10.8 //

body.text: tvad ṛte nikhilaṃ viśvaṃ samadṛgyātam īkṣyatām &

children.text: īśvaraḥ punar etasya tvam eko viṣamekṣaṇaḥ // UtSst_10.9 //

body.text: āstāṃ bhavatprabhāveṇa vinā sattaiva nāsti yat &

children.text: tvaddūṣaṇakathā yeṣām tvad ṛte nopapadyate // UtSst_10.10 //
tvayi cet syān mama vibho kim anyad upayujyate // UtSst_10.11 //
anye bhramanti bhagavann ātmany evātisusthitāḥ // UtSst_10.12 //
tvām īśa tvatsamācāramātrāt siddhyanti jantavaḥ // UtSst_10.13 //

body.text: bhṛtyā vayaṃ tava vibho tena trijagatāṃ yathā &

children.text: bibharṣy ātmānam evaṃ te bharttavyā vayam apy alam // UtSst_10.14 //
tvayi sparśarase 'tyantatarasutkaṇṭhito(?) 'smi te // UtSst_10.15 //

body.text: deva duḥkhāny aśeṣāṇi yāni saṃsāriṇām api &

children.text: ghṛtyākhyabhavadīyātmayutāny āyānti sahyatām // UtSst_10.16 //

body.text: sarvajñe sarvaśaktau ca tvayy eva sati cinmaye &

children.text: sarvathāpy asato nātha yuktāsya jagataḥ prathā // UtSst_10.17 //
nṛtyanti pavanoddhūtāḥ kārpāsāḥ picavo yathā // UtSst_10.18 //

body.text: yadi nātha guṇeṣv ātmābhimāno na bhavet tataḥ &

children.text: kena hīyeta jagatas tvadekātmatayā prathā // UtSst_10.19 //
tvatkopapāvakasparśapūtā ye parameśvara // UtSst_10.20 //
sarvato 'pīśa tat kasmāt tamasi prasarāmy aham // UtSst_10.21 //

body.text: avibhāgo bhavān eva svarūpam amṛtaṃ mama &

children.text: tathāpi martyadharmāṇām aham evaikam āspadam // UtSst_10.22 //
praṇāmāṅkaś ca śirasi sa evaikaḥ prabhāvitaḥ // UtSst_10.23 //

body.text: sadasac ca bhavān eva yena tenāprayāsataḥ &

children.text: svarasenaiva bhagavaṃs tathā siddhiḥ kathaṃ na me // UtSst_10.24 //

body.text: śivadāsaḥ śivaikātmā kiṃ yan nāsādayet sukham &

children.text: tarpyo 'smi devamukhyānām api yenāmṛtāsavaiḥ // UtSst_10.25 //
grasase tvaṃ mahāvahniḥ sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam // UtSst_10.26 //

body.text: jagad idam athavā suhṛdo bandhujano vā na bhavati mama kim api &

children.text: tvaṃ punar etat sarvaṃ yadā tadā ko 'paro me 'stu // UtSst_11.1 //

body.text: svāmin maheśvaras tvaṃ sākṣāt sarvaṃ jagat tvam eveti &

children.text: vastv eva siddhim etv iti yācñā tatrāpi yācñaiva // UtSst_11.2 //

body.text: tribhuvanādhipatitvam apīha yat tṛṇam iva pratibhāti bhavajjuṣaḥ &

children.text: kim iva tasya phalaṃ śubhakarmaṇo bhavati nātha bhavatsmaraṇād ṛte // UtSst_11.3 //

body.text: yena naiva bhavato 'sti vibhinnaṃ kiñcanāpi jagatāṃ prabhavaś ca &

children.text: tvadvijṛmbhitam ato 'dbhutakarmasv apy udeti na tava stutibandhaḥ // UtSst_11.4 //

body.text: tvanmayo 'smi bhavadarcananiṣṭhaḥ sarvadāham iti cāpy avirāmam &

children.text: bhāvayann api vibho svarasena svapnago 'pi na tathā kim iva syām // UtSst_11.5 //
teṣu visram iva bhavati samastaṃ bhogajātam amarair api mṛgyam // UtSst_11.6 //

body.text: hṛdi te na tu vidyate 'nyad anyad vacane karmaṇi cānyad eva śaṃbho &

children.text: paramārthasato 'py anugraho vā yadi vā nigraha eka eva kāryaḥ // UtSst_11.7 //
śambho tathā kalaya śīghram upaimi yena sarvottamāṃ dhuram apojjhitaduḥkhamārgaḥ // UtSst_11.8 //

body.text: tvatkarṇadeśama dhiśayya mahārghabhāvam ākranditāni mama tucchatarāṇi yānti &

children.text: vaṃśāntarālapatitāni jalaikadeśakhaṇḍāni mauktikamaṇitvam ivodvahanti // UtSst_11.9 //

body.text: kim iva ca labhyate bata na tair api nātha janaiḥ kṣaṇam api kaitavād api ca ye tava nāmni ratāḥ &

children.text: śiśiramayūkhaśekhara tathā kuru yena mama kṣatamaraṇo 'ṇimādikam upaimi yathā vibhavam // UtSst_11.10 //

body.text: śambho śarva śaśaṅkaśekhara śiva tryakṣākṣamālādhara śrīmann ugrakapālalāñchana lasadbhīmatriśūlāyudha &

children.text: kāruṇyāmbunidhe trilokaracanāśīlograśaktyātmaka śrīkaṇṭhāśu vināśayāśubhabharān ādhat svasiddhiṃ parām // UtSst_11.11 //

body.text: tat kiṃ nātha bhaven na yatra bhagavān nirmātṛtām aśnute bhāvaḥ syāt kim u tasya cetanavato nāśāsti yaṃ śaṅkaraḥ &

children.text: itthaṃ te parameśvarākṣatamahāśakteḥ sadā saṃśritaḥ saṃsāre 'tra nirantarādhividhuraḥ kliśyāmy ahaṃ kevalam // UtSst_11.12 //

body.text: yady apy atra varapradoddhatatamāḥ pīḍājarāmṛtyava ete vā kṣaṇam āsatāṃ bahumataḥ śabdādir evāsthiraḥ &

children.text: tatrāpi spṛhayāmi santatasukhākāṅkṣī ciraṃ sthāsnave bhogāsvādayutatvadaṅghrikamaladhyānāgrya jīvātave // UtSst_11.13 //

body.text: he nātha praṇatārtināśanapaṭo śreyonidhe dhūrjaṭe duḥkhaikāyatanasya janmamaraṇatrastasya me sāmpratam &

children.text: tac ceṣṭasva yathā manojñaviṣayāsvādapradā uttamā jīvann eva samaśnuve 'ham acalāḥ siddhīs tvadarcāparaḥ // UtSst_11.14 //
sarvaprakāśātiśayaprakāśāyendulakṣmaṇe // UtSst_11.15 //

body.text: sahakāri na kiñcid iṣyate bhavato na pratibandhakaṃ dṛṣi &

children.text: bhavataiva hi sarvam āplutaṃ katham adyāpi tathāpi nekṣase // UtSst_12.1 //
prabhavantam api svataḥ sadā paripaśyeyam apoḍhaviśvakam // UtSst_12.2 //

body.text: kathaṃ te jāyeran katham api ca te darśanapathaṃ vrajeyuḥ kenāpi prakṛtimahatāṅkena khacitaḥ &

children.text: tathotthāyotthāya sthalajalatṛṇāder akhilataḥ padārthadyānsṛṣṭisravadamṛtapūrair(?) vikirasi // UtSst_12.3 //
unmūlitatṛṣo mattā vicaranti yathāruci // UtSst_12.4 //

body.text: na tadā na sadā na caikadety api sā yatra na kāladhīr bhavet &

children.text: tad idaṃ bhavadīyadarśanaṃ na ca nityaṃ na ca kathyate 'nyathā // UtSst_12.5 //
yad viśeyam abhisandhimātratas tvatsudhāsadanam arcanāya te // UtSst_12.6 //
ullasanti vimalāni helayā ceṣṭitāni ca vacāṃsi ca sphuṭam // UtSst_12.7 //
bhavabhūmiṣu tāsu tāsv ahaṃ prabhum arceyam anargalakriyaḥ // UtSst_12.8 //
atimātramadhūpayogataḥ paritṛpto vicareyam icchayā // UtSst_12.9 //
tasyāpy avaśyam uditaṃ sannidhānaṃ tavocitam // UtSst_12.10 //

body.text: bhagavann itarān apekṣiṇā nitarām ekarasena cetasā &

children.text: sulabhaṃ sakalopaśāyinaṃ prabhum ātṛpti pibeyam asmi kim // UtSst_12.11 //

body.text: tvayā nirākṛtam sarvaṃ heyam etat tad eva tu &

children.text: tvanmayaṃ samupādeyam ity ayaṃ sārasaṃgrahaḥ // UtSst_12.12 //
bhavato bahir apy abhāvamātrā katham īśān bhavet samarcyate vā // UtSst_12.13 //
kṣobhe 'py adhyakṣamī kṣeyaṃ tryakṣa tvām eva sarvataḥ // UtSst_12.14 //

body.text: prakaṭaya nijadhāma deva yasmiṃs tvam asi sadā parameśvarīsametaḥ &

children.text: prabhucaraṇarajaḥsamānakakṣyāḥ kim aviśvāsapadaṃ bhānti bhṛtyāḥ // UtSst_12.15 //

body.text: darśanapatham upayāto 'py apasarasi kuto mameśa bhṛtyasya &

children.text: kṣaṇamātrakam iha na bhavasi kasya na jantor dṛśor viṣayaḥ // UtSst_12.16 //
plāvanāt paramabhedamānayaṃs tvāṃ nijaṃ ca vapur āpnuyāṃ mudam // UtSst_12.17 //

body.text: aham ity amuto 'varuddhalokād bhavadīyāt pratipattisārato me &

children.text: aṇumātrakam eva viśvaniṣṭhaṃ ghaṭatāṃ yena bhaveyam arcitā te // UtSst_12.18 //

body.text: aparimitarūpam ahaṃ taṃ taṃ bhāvaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ paśyan &

children.text: tvām eva viśvarūpaṃ nijanāthaṃ sādhu paśyeyam // UtSst_12.19 //

body.text: bhavadaṅgagataṃ tam eva kasmān na manaḥ paryaṭatīṣṭam artham artham &

children.text: prakṛtikṣatir asti no tathāsya mama cecchā paripūryate paraiva // UtSst_12.20 //

body.text: śataśaḥ kila te tavānubhāvād bhagavan ke 'py amunaiva cakṣuṣā ye &

children.text: api hālikaceṣṭayā carantaḥ paripaśyanti bhavadvapuḥ sadāgre // UtSst_12.21 //

body.text: na sā matir udeti yā na bhavati tvadicchāmayī sadā śubham athetarad bhagavataivam ācaryate &

children.text: ato 'smi bhavadātmako bhuvi yathā tathā sañcaran sthi to 'niśam abādhitatvadamalaṅghripūjotsavaḥ // UtSst_12.22 //

body.text: bhavadīyagabhīrabhāṣiteṣu pratibhā samyag udetu me puro 'taḥ &

children.text: tadanuṣṭhitaśaktir apy atas tadbhavadarcāvyasanaṃ ca nirvirāmam // UtSst_12.23 //

body.text: vyavahārapade 'pi sarvadā pratibhātv arthakalāpa eṣa mām &

children.text: bhavato 'vayavo yathā na tu svata evādaraṇīyatāṃ gataḥ // UtSst_12.24 //

body.text: manasi svarasena yatra tatra pracaraty apy aham asya gocareṣu &

children.text: prasṛto 'py avilola eva yuṣmatparicaryācaturaḥ sadā bhaveyam // UtSst_12.25 //

body.text: bhagavan bhavadicchayaiva dāsas tava jāto 'smi parasya nātra śaktiḥ &

children.text: katham eṣa tathāpi vaktrabimbaṃ tava paśyāmi na jātu citram etat // UtSst_12.26 //

body.text: samutsukās tvāṃ prati ye bhavantaṃ pratyartharūpād avalokayanti &

children.text: teṣām aho kiṃ tadupasthitaṃ syāt kiṃ sādhanaṃ vā phalitaṃ bhavet tat // UtSst_12.27 //

body.text: bhāvā bhāvatayā santu bhavadbhāvena me bhava &

children.text: tathā na kiñcid apy astu na kiñcid bhavato 'nyathā // UtSst_12.28 //

body.text: yan na kiñcid api tanna kiñcid apy astu kiñcid api kiñcid eva me &

children.text: sarvathā bhavatu tāvatā bhavān sarvato bhavati labdhapūjitaḥ // UtSst_12.29 //

body.text: saṃgrahena sukhaduḥkhalakṣaṇaṃ māṃ prati sthitam idaṃ śṛṇu prabho &

children.text: saukhyam eṣa bhavatā samāgamaḥ svāminā viraha eva duḥkhitā // UtSst_13.1 //

body.text: antar apy atitarām aṇīyasī yā tvadaprathanakālikāsti me &

children.text: tām apīśa parimṛjya sarvataḥ svaṃ svarūpam amalaṃ prakāśaya // UtSst_13.2 //
tiṣṭhataḥ satatam arcataḥ prabhuṃ jīvitaṃ mṛtam athānyad astu me // UtSst_13.3 //

body.text: īśvaro 'ham aham eva rūpavān paṇḍito 'smi subhago 'smi ko 'paraḥ &

children.text: matsamo 'sti jagatīti śobhate mānitā tvadanurāgiṇaḥ param // UtSst_13.4 //
tad yathāsthitapadārthasaṃvidā māṃ kuruṣva caraṇārcanocitam // UtSst_13.5 //

body.text: dhyāyate tad anu dṛśyate tataḥ spṛśyate ca parameśvaraḥ svayam &

children.text: yatra pūjanamahotsavaḥ sa me sarvadāstu bhavato 'nubhāvataḥ // UtSst_13.6 //
yugmam etad itaretarāśrayaṃ bhaktiśāliṣu sadā vijṛmbhate // UtSst_13.7 //
sarvabhāvacaṣakeṣu pūriteṣv āpibann api bhaveyam unmadaḥ // UtSst_13.8 //

body.text: anyavedyam aṇumātram asti na svaprakāśam akhilaṃ vijṛmbhate &

children.text: yatra nātha bhavataḥ pure sthitaṃ tatra me kuru sadā tavārcituḥ // UtSst_13.9 //

body.text: dāsadhāmni viniyojito 'py ahaṃ svecchayaiva parameśvara tvayā &

children.text: darśanena na kim asmi pātritaḥ pādasaṃvahanakarmaṇāpi vā // UtSst_13.10 //

body.text: śaktipātasamaye vicāraṇaṃ prāptam īśa na karoṣi karhicit &

children.text: adya māṃ prati kim āgataṃ yataḥ svaprakāśanavidhau vilambase // UtSst_13.11 //

body.text: tatra tatra viṣaye bahirvibhāty antare ca parameśvarīyutam &

children.text: tvāṃ jagattritayanirbharaṃ sadā lokayeya nijapāṇipūjitam // UtSst_13.12 //
syāṃ prasāda paramāmṛtāsavāpānakeliparilabdhanirvṛtiḥ // UtSst_13.13 //
tāṃ samarpayati tena te vapuḥ pūjayanty acalabhaktiśālinaḥ // UtSst_13.14 //

body.text: sphārayasy akhilam ātmanā sphuran viśvam āmṛśasi rūpam āmṛśan &

children.text: yat svayaṃ nijarasena ghurṇase tat samullasati bhāvamaṇḍalam // UtSst_13.15 //

body.text: yo 'vikalpam idam arthamaṇḍalaṃ paśyatīśa nikhilaṃ bhavadvapuḥ &

children.text: svātmapakṣaparipūrite jagaty asya nityasukhinaḥ kuto bhayam // UtSst_13.16 //

body.text: kaṇṭhakoṇaviniviṣṭam īśa te kālakūṭam api me mahāmṛtam &

children.text: apy upāttam amṛtaṃ bhavadvapur bhedavṛtti yadi rocate na me // UtSst_13.17 //
syām athāpi bhavadarcanakriyāpreyasīparigatāśayaḥ sadā // UtSst_13.18 //

body.text: īhitaṃ na bata pārameśvaraṃ śakyate gaṇayituṃ tathā ca me &

children.text: rājati tato 'nurūpām āropaya siddhibhūmikām aja mām // UtSst_19.13 //

body.text: siddhilavalābhalubdhaṃ mām avalepena mā vibho saṃsthāḥ &

children.text: kṣāmas tvadbhaktimukhe prollasadaṇimādipakṣato mokṣaḥ // UtSst_19.14 //

body.text: dāsasya me prasīdatu bhagavān etāvad eva nanu yāce &

children.text: dātā tribhuvananātho yasya na tanmādṛśāṃ dṛśo viṣayaḥ // UtSst_19.15 //
māmake vikasad astu sadaiva prasravanmadhu kim apy atilokam // UtSst_19.16 //

body.text: asti me prabhur asau janako 'tha tryambako 'tha jananī ca bhavānī &

children.text: na dvitīya iha ko 'pi mamāstīty eva nirvṛtatamo vicareyam // UtSst_19.17 //
upavītīkṛtabhoginam indukalāśekharaṃ vande // UtSst_20.1 //
vilasatkapālamālākalpitanṛttotsavākalpam // UtSst_20.2 //

body.text: vande tān daivataṃ yeṣāṃ haraś ceṣṭā harocitāḥ &

children.text: haraikapravaṇāḥ prāṇāḥ sadā saubhāgyasadmanām // UtSst_20.3 //

body.text: krīḍitaṃ tava maheśvaratāyāḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nyad idam eva yathaitat &

children.text: iṣṭamātraghaṭiteṣv avadāneṣv ātmanā param upāyam upaimi // UtSst_20.4 //
tava nātha kiyān bhūyānn ānandarasasambhavaḥ // UtSst_20.5 //

body.text: kathaṃ sa subhago mā bhūdyo gauryā vallabho haraḥ &

children.text: haro 'pi mā bhūd atha kiṃ gauryāḥ paramavallabhaḥ // UtSst_20.6 //
saṃvillatās tathārūpās tasya kasyāpi sattaroḥ // UtSst_20.7 //
mahānikaṣapāṣāṇasthūṇā pūjaiva jāyate // UtSst_20.8 //
sadā tribhuvanāhāratṛptāya svāmine namaḥ // UtSst_20.9 //

body.text: na kvāpi gatvā hitvāpi na kiṃcid idam eva ye &

children.text: bhavyaṃ tvaddhāma paśyanti bhavyās tebhyo namo namaḥ // UtSst_20.10 //
etayā vā daridraṇāṃ kim anyad upayācitam // UtSst_20.11 //

body.text: duḥkhāny api sukhāyante viṣam apy amṛtāyate &

children.text: mokṣāyate ca saṃsāro yatra mārgaḥ sa śaṅkaraḥ // UtSst_20.12 //

body.text: mūle madhye 'vasāne ca nāsti duḥkhaṃ bhavajjuṣāṃ &

children.text: tathāpi vayam īśāna sīdāmaḥ katham ucyatām // UtSst_20.13 //
prakāśaḥ svairiṇām iva bhavān bhaktimatāṃ prabho // UtSst_20.14 //

body.text: bhaktānāṃ nārtayo nāpy asty ādhyānaṃ svātmanas tava &

children.text: tathāpy asti śivety etat kim apy eṣāṃ bahirmukhe // UtSst_20.15 //
aham etad iti staumi tāṃ kriyāśaktim īśa te // UtSst_20.16 //
grasamānās tato vande deva viśvaṃ bhavanmayam // UtSst_20.17 //
evamevodyate nātha tvayā saṃhāralīlayā // UtSst_20.18 //

body.text: dhyātam ātmupatiṣṭhata eva tvadvapur varada bhaktidhanānām &

children.text: apy acintyam akhilādbhutacintākartṛtāṃ prati ca te vijayante // UtSst_20.19 //
nṛtyati vīrajano niśi vetālakulaiḥ kṛtotsāhaḥ // UtSst_20.20 //

body.text: ārabdhā bhavadabhinutir amunā yenāṅgakena mama śambho &

children.text: tenāparyantam imaṃ kālaṃ dṛḍham akhilam eva bhaviṣīṣṭa // UtSst_20.21 //
